attributes.action: to appoint Paul Moore as the replacement to Sir James Crosby on UK Financials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK Financials plc, the company that holds the UK government stakes in the UK Banks, namely RBS & Lloyds TSB, needs a Deputy Chairman to replace Sif James Crosby.  

The country needs someone who understands the banking industry, has acted with integrity and who is unafraid to challenge the establishment.

Paul Moore, former risk officer of HBOS, has these qualities and should be considered for the role.  His testimony to Parliament's finance committee, about HBOS's attitude to risk is available at: http://v2.ftalphaville.ft.com/blog/2009/02/11/52320/hbos-the-moore-memo/
